ModMetaData.name: Advanced Research - Example 1 - Locking and Unlocking Buildings
ModMetaData.author: RimWorld CCL Team
ModMetaData.description:
This is an example of how to lock and unlock buildings as new research is complete.
Demonstrates: CommunityCoreLibrary.AdvancedResearchDef to lock and unlock buildings Creating automatic help menu entries for advanced research SequencedInjectionSet_ThingDefAvailability in a CommunityCoreLibrary.ModHelperDef to change the designation category of a ThingDef
